name: The 2022 9th International Conference on Linguistics, Literature and Arts
content: Paper publication: Accepted papers after proper registration and presentation in ICLLA 2022 will be published in International Journal of Languages, Literature and Linguistics (IJLLL, ISSN: 2382-6282, DOI: 10.18178/IJLLL). International Journal of Languages, Literature and Linguistics (IJLLL, ISSN: 2382-6282) Frequency: Quarterly | DOI: 10.18178/IJLLL Indexing: Google Scholar and Crossreff
